price: 28. Qur’aan af Carabi ah, aan wax qallooc ahi lahayn8, si ay (xumaha uga) dhowrsadaan (oo Alle u hoggaansamaan).
arabic: قُرۡءَانًا عَرَبِيًّا غَيۡرَ ذِي عِوَجٖ لَّعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: 8. Aan lahayn wax ka weecasho ah xaqa.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qur'ānan ʿarabiyyan ghayra dhī ʿiwajin laʿallahum yattaqūna
